title: Bug 117981: Unable to select any item at the first time in library outline view
description: Description: Any item cannot be selected at the first time in the library outline view.
OB: When attempting to select an item in the library outline view for the first time, the focus jumps to the library file node instead of selecting the desired item.
EB: Expected Behavior: The system should allow users to select any item in the library outline view without the focus jumping to the library file node.
SR: Steps to Reproduce: 1. Add a label in the library file. 2. Select the label item in the library outline view. 3. Attempt to select another item in the library outline view.
